content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- identify number of trips made from each borough
SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
   BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)AS[result]
WHERE PULocationID IS NULL

-- join

SELECT  taxi_zone.*,trip_data.*
    FROM OPENROWSET (
                    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
                )AS trip_data
    JOIN  
         OPENROWSET (
                    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'csv',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
                )
                WITH (
                    location_id SMALLINT 1,
                    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
                    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
                    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
                )AS taxi_zone
    ON    trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone.location_id

-- calculate number of trip for each borough

SELECT  taxi_zone.borough,COUNT(1)AS number_of_trips
    FROM OPENROWSET (
                    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
                )AS trip_data
    JOIN  
         OPENROWSET (
                    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'csv',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
                )
                WITH (
                    location_id SMALLINT 1,
                    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
                    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
                    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
                )AS taxi_zone
    ON    trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone.location_id
    GROUP BY borough
    ORDER BY number_of_trips
